```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

library(forecast)
library(tidyverse)

```



```{r data}
vnv <- read_csv2("https://px.hagstofa.is:443/pxis/sq/56bced43-7a7a-4406-bc91-fceeaa46ed55",
                 locale = locale(encoding = "latin1"))

colnames(vnv)[3] <- "visitala"
vnv$visitala <- as.numeric(vnv$visitala)

dags <- seq.Date(from = as.Date("1988-05-01"),
                 to = as.Date("2019-12-01"),
                 by = "month")

vnv <- vnv %>% 
  select(visitala) %>% 
  na.omit()

vnv$date <- dags

ts_vnv <- ts(vnv$visitala, start = c(1988, 5), frequency = 12)
```


```{r forecast}

fit <- auto.arima(ts_vnv)

fit %>% forecast(h = 12) %>% 
  autoplot(include = 60)

```
